title: Serenity, is the endless journey buried deep within our souls. Even for those who have lost both their...

attachments.displayName: Serenity, is the endless journey buried deep within our souls. Even for those who have lost both their soul, and their way, because of the rage, the journey continues, as a reflection of the moon on water, from within. To a deeper level, we sit in quiet meditation, and again attempt to move ourselves back to where we began, so we may once again see where we must go, to hopefully find such a peace. The distractions assail us like heavy rain, and constantly reminds us that we were here centuries ago, and got lost then as well, because of such distractions. The Circle is now complete, and it is time to focus on where we must go, and put aside the past, along with the pain that has come to us, and the pain we have brought to others. We started on this ancient path once, and this time, we must answer this call. Time to cleanse our blades and walk the path ahead on this journey to find, and live as one with all things...

object.content: Serenity, is the endless journey buried deep within our souls. Even for those who have lost both their soul, and their way, because of the rage, the journey continues, as a reflection of the moon on water, from within. To a deeper level, we sit in quiet meditation, and again attempt to move ourselves back to where we began, so we may once again see where we must go, to hopefully find such a peace. The distractions assail us like heavy rain, and constantly reminds us that we were here centuries ago, and got lost then as well, because of such distractions. The Circle is now complete, and it is time to focus on where we must go, and put aside the past, along with the pain that has come to us, and the pain we have brought to others. We started on this ancient path once, and this time, we must answer this call. Time to cleanse our blades and walk the path ahead on this journey to find, and live as one with all things...
